    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Water wave refraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserwelle Brechung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction de vague de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction da onda da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione dell'onda dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση κυμάτων ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción de la onda del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that water waves are refracted when they move from deeper water to shallower water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boundaries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deeper water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shallower water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß Wasserwellen 
refracted, wenn sie vom tieferen Wasser auf flacheres Wasser umziehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que des vagues de l'eau sont 
réfractées quand elles se déplacent de l'eau plus profonde à
l'eau plus peu profonde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que as ondas da água 
refracted quando se movem de uma água mais profunda para uma água 
mais rasa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che le onde dell'acqua 
refracted quando si muovono da acqua più profonda verso acqua più 
poco profonda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι τα κύματα ύδατος 
διαθλιούνται όταν κινούνται από τα πιό μεγάλα θαλάσσια βάθη 
προς το πιό ρηχό ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que las ondas del agua 
están refractadas cuando se mueven desde un agua más profunda a un 
agua más baja.</string>
          </description>
